p: In some European countries like Italy, Turkey, and Greece, PO has been used to treat a variety of diseases such as headache, stomach intestine and kidney pains, intestinal worms, dysentery, urogenital infections, urinary inflammations, scurvy, fever, and hemorrhoids (Bosi et al., 2009 ▶; Simopoulos, 2004 ▶; Brussell, 2004 ▶; Cakilcioglu and Turkoglu, 2010 ▶).
